narrative.title: 51St Highland Division - 1943Q2
narrative.situation: British infantry_division deployed in North Africa during 1943Q2.
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.

weather.terrain: Coastal Tunisia (April-May): wadis, hills, fortified positions. Sicily preparation (June): amphibious landing training
seasonal_impacts: Hot, dry conditions returning after winter rains
Favorable weather for amphibious operations planning
environmental_challenges: Water supply critical in Tunisian heat

air_support.note: No theater air summary available for this quarter

special_rules: Elite Highland regiments with exceptional esprit de corps
Veteran desert warfare experience (El Alamein, pursuit, Tunisia)
Proven night attack capability (demonstrated at Wadi Akarit 5-6 April)
Coordinated combined arms operations with artillery and armor support
Amphibious assault training for Sicily invasion (June 1943)
